const pets = await tradingGame.getAllPets();
console.log("Pet 6 isForSale:", pet.isForSale);
const pet = await tradingGame.pets(6);
await tradingGame.petForSale(6, 1);
const tradingGame = TradingGame.attach("0x9Cde1Af562Ed60D7D3C1bbBD8657C90769122a73");
const TradingGame = await ethers.getContractFactory("TradingGame");
clear
await tradingGame.petForSale(6, 1);

const tradingGame = TradingGame.attach("0x9Cde1Af562Ed60D7D3C1bbBD8657C90769122a73");
